name: rows
title: Rows
description: Manage your Rows spreadsheets from your keyboard.
author: jose_brito

commands.name: open-spreadsheet
commands.title: Open Spreadsheet
commands.subtitle: Rows
commands.description: Open a spreadsheet from your workspace

tools.name: get-workspace-info
tools.title: Get Workspace Info
tools.description: Get details of the Rows workspace

tools.name: list-spreadsheets
tools.title: List Spreadsheets
tools.description: List spreadsheets in the workspace, optionally by folder

tools.name: get-spreadsheet
tools.title: Get Spreadsheet
tools.description: Get pages and table names for a spreadsheet

tools.name: get-table-contents
tools.title: Get Table Contents
tools.description: Get values from a table range

tools.name: append-values-to-table
tools.title: Append Values to Table
tools.description: Append rows of values into a table range

tools.name: modify-cells-in-table
tools.title: Modify Cells in Table
tools.description: Write values and formulas to cells in a table range

ai.instructions: When asked to open or modify a spreadsheet, first get the spreadsheet structure, then get the table contents. If multiple match, ask the user to choose. Confirm before updating or deleting data.

preferences.name: apiToken
preferences.title: Rows API Token
preferences.description: Your Rows API token. Get it from https://rows.com/developers/api-keys

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
